front.title: IETF ICANN Protocol Support Organization Appointments Procedures

abstract.t: This document specifies the process by which the IETF appoints its 2representatives to ICANN's Protocol Support Organization's ProtocolCouncil (PSO-PC). Additionally, mechanisms that the IETF will adoptfor identifying candidates for the PSO's appointments to the ICANNBoard of Directors are specified. This process specificationreflects 2 years of IETF experience with ICANN, the PSO-PC and thePSO organization, since their inception in 1999.
